price: (Yaa Muhammad!) Jedhi: “Ani wanti gara kiyyatti wahyii godhamu ‘dhugaan gabbaramaan keessan gabbaramaa tokkicha’ (kan jedhuu dha)Sila isin Muslimoota hin taatanuu ree?”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fahal antum mus'limūna
